name: 適應體育趨勢專題研究
goals: To describe basic elements of coaching in promoting life‐long sport participation for individuals with disabilities 適應體育趨勢之基本知能
To introduce scientific foundation of basic coaching skills that enable effective coaching practice 介紹適應體育趨勢與當前相關研究與實務 現況
To provide an overview of historical and contemporary issues, concepts and values in the international field of sport coaching science and management 介紹國際上適應體育趨勢在歷史與現今的 議題、概念、價值觀演變趨勢。
